身を起こす: (みをおこす) - to get up (e.g. from bed); to make one's way in the world/to achieve in life
身を躱す: (みをかわす) - to dodge; to evade
身一つ: (みひとつ) - one's body alone; lacking possessions
身上: (しんじょう) - merit; body; social position

身上り: (みあがり) - taking a day off by paying one's own fee to one's master (of a prostitute; often in order to see her lover)
身上調書: (しんじょうちょうしょ) - (yoji) personal information form; dossier on an individual
身上調査: (しんじょうちょうさ) - (yoji) examine (investigate into) a person's history
身二つになる: (みふたつになる) - to give birth
身仕度: (みじたく) - dress/outfit/getup; to dress oneself/to outfit oneself
身仕舞い: (みじまい) - dressing or outfitting oneself
身代り: (みがわり) - substitute (for); sacrifice (of, to); scapegoat (for)
身代わり: (みがわり) - substitute (for); sacrifice (of, to); scapegoat (for)
身代を傾ける: (しんだいをかたむける) - to squander one's fortunes
身代金要求: (みのしろきんようきゅう) - ransom demand
身位: (しんい) - rank and social status (e.g. in the imperial family)
身体じゅう: (からだじゅう) - throughout the body; from head to foot; all over
身体で覚える: (からだでおぼえる) - to master something (through personal experience)
身体上: (しんたいじょう) - physical; bodily; corporeal
身体中: (からだじゅう) - throughout the body; from head to foot; all over

身体改造: (しんたいかいぞう) - body modification
身体検査: (しんたいけんさ) - physical examination/medical checkup; frisking/pat-down/search
身体能力: (しんたいのうりょく) - physical ability
身体装検器: (しんたいそうけんき) - type of detector used at airports
身体装飾: (しんたいそうしょく) - body ornamentation (adornment, tattoos, etc.)

身元: (みもと) - person's identity; ID; past; background
身元不明: (みもとふめい) - (yoji) (a person or body being) unidentifiable (unidentified)
身元不明者: (みもとふめいしゃ) - John Doe; Jane Doe; person unknown
身元保証人: (みもとほしょうにん) - (personal) guarantor; (personal) surety; person providing a character reference
身元保証書: (みもとほしょうしょ) - personal reference letter; personal reference guarantee
身元照会先: (みもとしょうかいさき) - reference (e.g. on CV, resume)
身元確認: (みもとかくにん) - ID; person's identity; checking background
身元調査: (みもとちょうさ) - identity or background check (often to see if someone is a burakumin)
身光: (しんこう) - aureole (of a Buddhist statue; surrounding the body but not the head); aureola
身八つ: (みやつ) - small opening in the side of some traditional Japanese clothing (located where the sleeve meets the bodice, below the armpit)
身八つ口: (みやつぐち) - small opening in the side of some traditional Japanese clothing for women and children (e.g. kimono, yukata) (located where the sleeve meets the bodice, below the armpit)
身八口: (みやつぐち) - small opening in the side of some traditional Japanese clothing for women and children (e.g. kimono, yukata) (located where the sleeve meets the bodice, below the armpit)
身共: (みども) - I (used when speaking to their equals or inferiors); me
身内: (みうち) - relatives/one's family; friends/members of the same organization; followers/henchmen; one's whole body
身分の高い人: (みぶんのたかいひと) - man of high position
身分不相応: (みぶんふそうおう) - beyond one's means or position; inappropriate to one's lot in life
身分事項: (みぶんじこう) - matters for identification; documentation
身分意識: (みぶんいしき) - (yoji) status consciousness; perception of one's social status
身分相応: (みぶんそうおう) - (yoji) appropriate to one's lot in life; within one's means; fitting to one's position; suitable to one's social status
身分証: (みぶんしょう) - identification papers; ID
身分証明書: (みぶんしょうめいしょ) - identification papers; ID; piece of identification; identity document
身分詐称: (みぶんさしょう) - (yoji) false personation; misrepresentation of one's social position
身動き: (みうごき) - moving about; stirring about
身動ぐ: (みじろぐ) - to stir; to move
身包み: (みぐるみ) - all one has; all one's possessions
身包みはがれる: (みぐるみはがれる) - to be stripped of all one has
身受け: (みうけ) - paying to get someone (esp. a geisha, prostitute, etc.) out of bondage
身口意: (しんくい) - action, speech and thought
身嗜み: (みだしなみ) - personal appearance; personal grooming
身土不二: (しんどふに) - inseparability of body-mind and geographical circumstances

身屋: (もや) - {archit}  purlin (structural beam in a roof)/purline; main building (of a manor); central room (in traditional palatial-style architecture)
身形: (みなり) - dress; attire; clothing; getup; outfit; personal appearance
身心一如: (しんじんいちにょ) - (yoji) body and mind as one; mind-body unity
身投げ: (みなげ) - throwing oneself (e.g. into the water to commit suicide)
